description: User experience refinement and tactile feedback integration.
changelog:
• New Haptic Feedback: Added a master toggle for tactile button responses.
• UI/UX Enhancements: Replaced system toasts with modern Snackbars and updated button iconography.
• Improved Navigation: Implemented 'Double Back to Exit' to prevent accidental closures.
• Feature Update: Moved 'Daily Word' to a clean dialog for better focus.
• Privacy & Security: Integrated Privacy Policy within the About page.
• Stability: Fixed search indicator bugs and optimized list filtering.
